name: Personal Website
technologies: Angular, Typescript, HTML5, SCSS, JSON, Netflify (if it's still free by the time you read this)

name: Magic Chalk
description: Web-cam application that lets user scribble simple mathematical equations in the air. Uses Ai-based technologies to parse the scribble, solve the detected equation, and save it on app's interface. Trained and tweaked our own CNN model achieving 96% accuracy.
technologies: Python, Streamlit, OpenCV, Kaggle, MediaPipe, TensorFlow

name: AuthentInk
description: Signature forger detector. Employs a Siamese Neural Network and uses contrastive loss to measure the signatures' similarities. Enables users to capture live signature images through external camera, and compare them to a stored authentic signature dataset. Submitted @ MAIS Hacks 2023. Won 3rd place.
technologies: Python, OpenCV, PyQt5, MediaPipe framework, Pytorch, Kaggle
